level.text: Each nurse aide training program shall maintain an accurate and appropriate system of record keeping.
Each nurse aide training program shall ensure that administrative and personnel records are protected against loss, destruction, and unauthorized review.
A record for each nurse aide trainee shall be maintained by the facility and shall include the trainee’s evaluation and health information.
Each instructor’s personnel records shall be maintained by the facility and shall include application data, qualifications, and position description.
All records shall be maintained by the training facility for a minimum of five (5) years.
